11.name: Britannia International Hotel Canary Wharf
11.description: Britannia International Hotel Canary Wharf has spacious rooms and limited free WiFi access in bedrooms, just 600 m from Canary Wharf Underground Station.

12.name: Concept Living Apartments Kensington
12.description: Set in London, Concept Living Apartments Kensington offers city views and free WiFi, 1.5 km from Olympia Exhibition Centre and 1.8 km from Natural History Museum.

13.name: Trinity Peach Tree
13.description: Located in London, 5 km from Tower of London and 5 km from Victoria Park, Trinity Peach Tree provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV

14.name: London City Gate - Kings Cross - St Pancras
14.description: Offering free WiFi, London City Gate - Kings Cross - St Pancras is set in the Central London and it near King's Cross Theatre. Guests have a terrace and garden.

15.name: Notting Hill Apartment
15.description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, LG is an apartment set in London, 300 metres from Portobello Road Market. The apartment is 2.2 km from Olympia Exhibition Centre.

21.name: Izmailovo Beta Hotel
21.description: Set near the Izmailovsky Park, within a 3-minute walk of Partizanskaya Metro Station, Izmailovo Beta Hotel features free WiFi, banquet and meeting facilities and a variety of dining options.

22.name: Winterfell on Kropotkinskaya
22.description: Set in Moscow, an 8-minute walk from Cathedral of Christ the Saviour and Kropotkinskaya Metro Station, Winterfell on Kropotkinskaya features rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi.

23.name: Raikin Plaza Hotel
23.description: Raikin Plaza Hotel is located in the central part of Moscow, 50 metres from Maryina Roshcha Metro Station. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

24.name: Holiday Inn Moscow - Seligerskaya
24.description: Holiday Inn Moscow - Seligerskaya Hotel offers an indoor swimming pool, a fully equipped gym and a sauna. Free private parking and free WiFi are available throughout the hotel.

25.name: Holiday Inn Moscow Lesnaya
25.description: Surrounded by the restaurants of Lesnaya Street, this modern hotel in central Moscow offers soundproofed rooms with flat-screen TV, international cuisine, and a gym with modern exercise machines.

31.name: Hotel Pennsylvania
31.description: This Manhattan hotel is located across the street from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station

32.name: Martinique New York on Broadway, Curio Collection by Hilton
32.description: This Beaux-Arts hotel with a French Renaissance design has a restaurant/bar and enjoys a central Manhattan location. It is located less than 1 km from Times Square and Penn Station is 644 m from the property.

33.name: Club Quarters Hotel Midtown - Times Square
33.description: Offering an on-site restaurant and 24-hour concierge services, this hotel is located in a historic Midtown Manhattan building within walking distance of top attractions. Free WiFi access is offered.

34.name: Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central
34.description: Located in Manhattan, this New York hotel offers free Wi-Fi and rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV and plush bedding.

35.name: Duane Street Hotel Tribeca
35.description: Surrounded by art galleries and shops in the lively Tribeca neighbourhood of lower Manhattan, this boutique hotel offers an on-site restaurant and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and free Wi-Fi.

41.name: Hôtel Bourg Tibourg
41.description: Boasting a garden, Hôtel Bourg Tibourg is situated in Paris in the Ile de France region, 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre and 1.7 km from Sainte-Chapelle.

42.name: Hotel Le petit Paris
42.description: Located 250 m from the Luxembourg Garden, this hotel offers luxurious guest rooms set in an 18th-century building at the heart of the Latin Quarter.

43.name: Hôtel La Parizienne by Elegancia
43.description: Hôtel La Parizienne by Elegancia is a design hotel located in in the chic 6th district in Paris, a 10-minute walk from the Luxembourg Gardens.

44.name: Hotel Lumen Paris Louvre
44.description: This elegant hotel is located in central Paris, just a 5-minute walk from The Louvre Museum. The hotel offers a bar and restaurant with terrace. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

45.name: Hôtel des Grands Hommes
45.description: Set in an 18th-century building opposite the Panthéon, this hotel is 400 m from the Luxembourg Garden. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and a ticket service.
